channel.title: Tut, for JavaC, and Java'ers!
channel.description:
JavaC means Java Compiler (I think :P) Java means well....Java (:D) Here is how to fix that damn javac + java error. Here me and some noobie talk about how to fix it!
Noobie: Max!!! Maxium: What? Noobie: I got that stupid Javac error! Noobie: The one were it says 'Javac' cannot be reconized!!! Maxium: Ok.. Maxium: I will tell you how to fix it! Noobie: Thx Maxium: Go to [b]Start > My Computer(RIGHT CLICK) > Properties > Advanced > Enviorment Variables > System Variables[/b] Noobie: Then? Maxium: Find in system variables, "Path" and click EDIT Noobie: Now what? Maxium: Next type ";" (no quotes). And type or copy and paste in > "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;" (no quotes). Noobie: Now I pressed OK then OK again on the properties, then I compiled... WOW IT WORKED!!!
No this is not a real chat :P if you don't understand this I will give it easier. In pictures [IMG]http://goldkeep.com/runeserver/javac/start.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://goldkeep.com/runeserver/javac/computer.bmp[/img] [IMG]http://goldkeep.com/runeserver/javac/finish.bmp[/img] For copy and paste, at the END of the Path > Edit, you can paste this there: [code];C:\PROGRAM FILES\JAVA\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\[/code] Credits: No one XD (Yes I am kitty kid from Rune-S3rver!)

item.title: Tut, for JavaC, and Java'ers!
item.dc:creator: @max1122333 max1122333
item.description:
@max1122333 wrote:

JavaC means Java Compiler (I think :P)
Java means well…Java (:D)

Here is how to fix that damn javac + java error. Here me and some noobie talk about how to fix it!

Noobie: Max!!! Maxium: What? Noobie: I got that stupid Javac error! Noobie: The one were it says 'Javac' cannot be reconized!!! Maxium: Ok.. Maxium: I will tell you how to fix it! Noobie: Thx Maxium: Go to [b]Start > My Computer(RIGHT CLICK) > Properties > Advanced > Enviorment Variables > System Variables[/b] Noobie: Then? Maxium: Find in system variables, "Path" and click EDIT Noobie: Now what? Maxium: Next type ";" (no quotes). And type or copy and paste in > "F:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;" (no quotes). Noobie: Now I pressed OK then OK again on the properties, then I compiled... WOW IT WORKED!!!

No this is not a real chat
if you don’t understand this I will give it easier. In pictures



For copy and paste, at the END of the Path > Edit, you can paste this there:

;C:\PROGRAM FILES\JAVA\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\

Credits: No one XD
(Yes I am kitty kid from Rune-S3rver!)
